name: Cosmic Tears
description: Cosmic Tears is a 2D platform game that takes place in the time of disaster. The game is about a god that decided to wipe out all humanity by creating mini black holes that in time will shallow all humanity. A goddess has approached you and given you a magical sword that said to hurt monsters created by the holes. The player has been given a role to save humanity from destruction. Can you save humanity from the dangers of the black hole and restore reality as it once was?
